page.title: 11Trade in Cowdenbeath
page.content: In Cowdenbeath a survey was taken to find out about trade. 8/10 shopowners said that their busiest time of the day was before lunch-time. The others either said that their busiest time was was lunch-time or later. 9/10 shopowners said their busiest day of the week was Saturday. Others said their busiest day was Monday. None of the shops surveyed said that they were bothered by shoplifting. Most shoppers said that they shopped every day of the week, but some around twice a week. They also mostly shopped in the mornings, but some shopped in the afternoon. Most shoppers did not only shop in Cowdenbeath but regularly journeyed to Dunfermline, Edinburgh and Kirkcaldy. The average shopper's age is 40/45.
